Package org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front

OAuth 2 servlet filters

See:
          Description

Class Summary
OAuth2Filter OAuth 2 Servlet filter to protect resources on a Resource server.
SecuredHttpRequest This wrapper allows the OAuth 2 filter to enrich the request with the user informations.
WebApplicationExceptionHandler Jersey Exception handler to set the WWW-Authenticate header when receiving a FORBIDDEN exception (insufficient rights).
 

Package org.resthub.oauth2.filter.front Description
